sources.title: My Boy Johnny (1944)
sources.description: In a departure from the usual Terrytoon, this short is based on predictions of things to come in the world after the end of World War II. It primarily deals with, in a comedy sense, what every "G.I." Jonnny can expect when he returns home to civilian life. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/my-boy-johnny-1944/

metadata.Plot: In a departure from the usual Terrytoon, this short is based on predictions of things to come in the world after the end of World War II. It primarily deals with, in a comedy sense, what every "G.I." Jonnny can expect when he returns home to civilian life.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
